summary: Eight strangers awaken with no memory, in a puzzling cube-shaped room where the laws of physics do not always apply.
cast: Kari Matchett|Geraint Wyn Davies|Grace Lynn Kung|Matthew Ferguson|Neil Crone|Barbara Gordon|Lindsey Connell|Greer Kent|Bruce Gray|Philip Akin|Paul Robbins|Andrew Scorer
keywords: writing on skin|falling up|calculus equation|number 60659|introducing self
title: Cube 2: Hypercube
